wip.title: Coming Soon
wip.description: This feature is currently under development. Stay tuned for updates!

settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Manage your application preferences and configurations.
settings.wipDescription: We are working on a comprehensive settings panel to give you full control over your experience.

profile.title: Profile
profile.description: This is how others will see you on the site.

personalInfo.title: Personal Information
personalInfo.usernameDescription: This is your public display name. It can be your real name or a pseudonym.
personalInfo.bioPlaceholder: Tell us a little bit about yourself

404.title: Lost in the Void?
404.description: We couldn't find the page you're looking for. It might have been abducted by aliens.

403.title: You Shall Not Pass!
403.description: You don't have permission to be here. Nice try though, we appreciate the effort.

500.title: Server Meltdown
500.description: The server is having a bad day. Our code monkeys are working hard to fix it.

default.title: Computer Says No
default.description: Something went wrong. We're not sure what, but it's probably not good.
